  • Method Details

    • askToJoinProject

      public void askToJoinProject(long projectId, jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, DuplicatedAttributeException, UnknownHostException, ElementAssociationException
      Handles the request of a user to join a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project to join
      securityContext - the security context containing the authenticated user
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user or project is not found
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the user is already a member of the project
      UnknownHostException - if an unknown host exception occurs
      ElementAssociationException

    • sendJoinRequisitionToManagers

      public void sendJoinRequisitionToManagers(ProjectMembershipEntity membershipEntity, UserEntity user, ProjectEntity projectEntity)
      Sends an email requisition to all project managers for a user's request to join a project.
      Parameters:
      membershipEntity - the project membership entity containing the join request details
      user - the user requesting to join the project
      projectEntity - the project to which the user is requesting to join

    • confirmAskToJoinProjectInvite

      public void confirmAskToJoinProjectInvite(String token, boolean approve, String approverUsername) throws EntityNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, UnauthorizedAccessException, UnknownHostException
      Confirms or rejects a user's request to join a project based on a provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - the token associated with the join request
      approve - true if the request is approved, false if rejected
      approverUsername - the username of the approver
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project membership or approver user is not found
      UserNotFoundException - if the approver user is not found
      UnauthorizedAccessException - if the approver is not a project manager
      UnknownHostException - if an error occurs during notification creation

    • sendInviteToUser

      public void sendInviteToUser(ProjectMembershipEntity membershipEntity, UserEntity user, ProjectEntity projectEntity) throws UnknownHostException
      Sends an invitation to a user to join a project and creates a notification for the invite.
      Parameters:
      membershipEntity - the project membership entity containing invitation details
      user - the user to be invited
      projectEntity - the project to which the user is invited
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - if an error occurs during notification creation

    • addUserToProject

      public void addUserToProject(String username, long projectId, boolean createHasAccepted, boolean isTheCreator, UserEntity authUser) throws EntityNotFoundException, UnknownHostException, ElementAssociationException
      Adds a user to a project, either directly or via an invite, and creates the necessary notifications and logs.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be added
      projectId - the ID of the project to which the user is being added
      createHasAccepted - flag indicating if the user has already accepted the invite
      isTheCreator - flag indicating if the user is the creator of the project
      authUser - the authenticated user performing the action
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found
      InputValidationException - if there is a validation error
      UnknownHostException - if an error occurs during notification creation
      ElementAssociationException

    • acceptProjectInvite

      public void acceptProjectInvite(String token, boolean approve) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Handles the acceptance or rejection of a project invite based on the provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - the acceptance token associated with the project invite
      approve - flag indicating whether the invite is approved or not
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project membership is not found

    • removeUserFromProject

      public void removeUserFromProject(String username, long projectId, jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, UnknownHostException, ForbiddenAccessException
      Removes a user from a project and creates appropriate notifications and logs. Reassign tasks the user is responsible for to the project creator.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be removed
      projectId - the ID of the project from which the user is to be removed
      securityContext - the security context containing the authenticated user's information
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found
      UnknownHostException - if an error occurs during notification creation
      ForbiddenAccessException

    • getProjectIdsByUserId

      public List<ProjectNameIdDto> getProjectIdsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of projects that the authenticated user is a member of.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectNameIdDto containing the IDs and names of the projects

    • getUsersBasicInfoByFirstLetter

      public List<UserBasicInfoDto> getUsersBasicInfoByFirstLetter(String firstLetter, long projectId)
      Retrieves a list of users' basic information whose usernames start with a specified first letter and are members of a specified project.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - the first letter to filter the usernames
      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      a list of UserBasicInfoDto containing the basic information of users

    • getProjectMembersByProjId

      public List<UserEntity> getProjectMembersByProjId(long projectId)
      Retrieves a list of user entities who are members of a specified project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      a list of UserEntity objects representing the members of the project

    • getProjectMembershipsByProject

      public List<ProjectMembershipDto> getProjectMembershipsByProject(long projectId)
      Retrieves a list of project memberships for users associated with a specific project.
      This method fetches the list of project memberships from the database using the provided project ID. It logs the operation for auditing purposes and handles any exceptions that may occur during the process.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project for which to retrieve user memberships.
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectMembershipDto objects representing the users associated with the specified project.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while fetching the project memberships.
